dcterms:creator: Amir Shahroudy

dcterms:description: A large scale dataset for 3D human activity analysis, consisting of 56,880 video samples from 60 categories of human actions, captured by three cameras simultaneously with different horizontal angles.
dcterms:title: NTU RGB+D

dcterms:creator: Will Kay
Joao Carreira

dcterms:description: A human action video dataset containing 400 action classes, with at least 400 video clips for each action taken from the Internet, focusing on various daily actions.
dcterms:title: Skeleton-Kinetics

dcterms:creator: Zhe Cao
Gines Hidalgo
Tomas Simon
Shih-En Wei
Yaser Sheikh
dcterms:description: A toolbox for real-time multi-person 2D pose estimation using part affinity fields, which was utilized to estimate the location of articulated joints in the Skeleton-Kinetics dataset.
dcterms:title: OpenPose
